title: What are some of the best books on fundamentals of automotive engineering for a beginner? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lecture notes from RWTH which can be ordered by non-university members as well. They give a clear insight into main components assembled in a car, their functions as well as criteria under which these are designed. 02 Longitudinal Dynamics of Vehicles (Automotive Engineering I) 04 Vertical and Lateral Dynamics of Vehicles (Automotive Engineering II) 06 Safety-Related Vehicle Systems and Driver Assistance Systems (Automotive Engineering III)
